title: Red Eagles Hokkaido
text:
Red Eagles Hokkaido (レッドイーグルス北海道) are a professional <a href="ice%20hockey">ice hockey</a> team based in <a href="Tomakomai%2C%20Hokkaido">Tomakomai</a> city on <a href="Hokkaid%C5%8D">Hokkaidō</a>, Japan. They are members of the <a href="Asia%20League%20Ice%20Hockey">Asia League Ice Hockey</a>.
History.
The club was founded as the Oji Eagles in 1925. They have won the <a href="Japan%20Ice%20Hockey%20League">Japan League</a> 13 times, the <a href="All%20Japan%20Ice%20hockey%20Championship">All Japan Championship</a> 37 times and the <a href="Asia%20League%20Ice%20Hockey">Asia League</a> 2 times. Oji became a founding member of Asia League Ice Hockey in 2003. In 2021 the team changed its name to Red Eagles Hokkaido.
